article_text: Eulen America and Ultra Aviation Services made it mandatory for employees to sign up and pay for a company-sponsored health plan even if the workers have better coverage from outside sources. Now one company is reconsidering.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Miami International Airport, Ultra Aviation, Eulen America, healthcare, employer mandate, health insurance, Affordable Care Act
article_metadata.title: Airport companies move workers onto employer health plans — like it or not | Miami Herald

article_summary:
Eulen America and Ultra Aviation Services made it mandatory for employees to sign up and pay for a company-sponsored health plan even if the workers have better coverage from outside sources.
Now one company is reconsidering.
